channel.title: TTRPG test site on
channel.description: Recent content in TTRPG test site on

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Configuration Quartz is designed to be extremely configurable. You can find the bulk of the configuration scattered throughout the repository depending on how in-depth you’d like to get.

item.title: Editing guideline
item.description: 1. Metadata 1.1 Titles Quartz requres precise title metadata so if you are ever making a new page, it has to have a metadata element which you can make by encapsualting text metadata with — — first key in metadata must be “title:” value in “title:” key must be in double qoutes " " 1.

item.title: How to edit
item.description: [!SUCCESS] PROS: all tools are all OS friendly coder friendly [!FAILURE] CONS: coder friendly non-coders RIP (unless you want to learn GitHub web-ui and some markdown) [!

item.title: The Seekers
item.description: An epic nordic flavored DND 5e campaign started on 05/03/2023 [[DNDTheSeekers/The Seekers Chars |Player characters:]] [[DNDTheSeekers/The Seekers Maps|Maps]] [[DNDTheSeekers/The Seekers Log|Campaign Log]]

item.title: TheSeekers S0: Char moments
item.description: Character highlights 0: svi mrze Potjeha (glasnocu) ðŸ¥² Ã¾rÃ¹Ã°r poziva strance na kockanje koje nitko osim Rungnia ne zna kako igrati (pa ni ona sama - fun first encounter x3 ðŸ‘Œ) Raksha ne zna citati AAron daje gold coin pipnicaru Taboo zamalo ubila covjeka s krova nakon sto je rasprsila prah po krovovima kuca (shortcut do gyma) Raksha probija plafon utezima u gymu AAron i Rungni scamaju oruzara Dwarven zvrljotinama Kashana velikodusno posuduje pare AAronu Khashana i Potjeh bacaju stvari iz inventorija za storage i unencumberedness u smece (bedroll & tinderbox go yeet~~) Ã¾rÃºÄ‘r podmicuje ljude s mrkvama Taboo uletava svima, al bez uspjeha ðŸ¥² Ã¾rÃ¹Ã°r se cijenka za popust sobe, ali Gumi se neda jer je cijena po osobi, a ne po sobi Taboo izbacena iz turnira zbog varanja magijom farmerica op u turnamentu ranila podosta Potjeha, al Potjeh se neda i pobijeduje u dvoboju u duelu, Rungni one-shota plemica Khashana i Raksha imaju friendly fight, inace ne bi toliko puta promasili napad, riiight?

item.title: TheSeekers S0: LOG
item.description: SESSION 0: Potjeh i AAron dolaze u Vidar Ã¾rÃºÄ‘r predlaze igru i skuplja sve na skup u Gumijevoj taverni Gumi predlaze Rakshi da se prijavi u Igre Snage druzina odlazi u hram i svi se prijavljuju druzina otkriva da stanovnici jako vole svog boga Vidara koji je medu ostalog bog osvete druzina se dijeli na one koji odlaze u gym i one koji odlaze u Visoki Market krecu Igre Snage koje se sastoje od sljedecih natjecanja: utrka, dizanje utjega, dueli Raksha pobjeduje u utrci, Potjeh u dizanju utega i Rungni u duelima pojavljuje se Dementor s dva zombija i zapocinje prava bitka
